package.description: The Canvas class provides a shape management layer for browsers that support Canvas, including a temporary drawing layer and event to shape coordination.

method.name: newInstance
method.param: XHTML Node reference, either a canvas element, or an element into which a canvas should be created.
method.return-value: A new instance of the Canvas class.
method.description: Creates a new instance of the Hemi Graphics Canvas class.

object.name: ShapeDecorator
object.description: A shape decorator receives event dispatches from the CanvasInstance allowing managed shapes to be manipulated in response to those events. Event properties and positions are captured prior to the event being dispatched to the decorator, and are available on the CanvasInstance.properties member.

method.name: handle_canvas_mousedown
method.param: The event captured for the Canvas.
method.description: Dispatched by the CanvasIntance for a mousedown event.

method.name: handle_canvas_mousemove
method.param: The event captured for the Canvas.
method.description: Dispatched by the CanvasIntance for a mousemove event.

method.name: handle_canvas_mouseup
method.param: The event captured for the Canvas.
method.description: Dispatched by the CanvasIntance for a mouseup event.
